Najah:

Najah shouted with pain "YOU'LL DEATH FOR THIS!!!!!!" . The snake 
transormed to beast mode and Bite FireBlade's neck while his snake-
like body tied up his hands. His cyber-poision started to act... A 
cyber poision that would kill him if someone didn't help...
